24 #define MESSAGE_FILE_VERSION 0
25 #define MESSAGE_MAX_LENGTH 255
26 
27 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
28  u8 version;
29  u8 type;
30  u16 size;
31  sn_t recipient ;
32  sn_t sender ;
33  loc_coord_t loc ;
34 } message_header_t;

41 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
42  message_header_t header ;
43  char data[MESSAGE_MAX_LENGTH+1] ;
44 } message_text_t;
45 
46 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
47  u32 * addr;
48  void * data;
49  size_t nbyte;
50 } message_request_recv_t;
51 
52 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
53  sn_t sn;
54  const void * data;
55  size_t nbyte;
56  void * context;
57  int (*progress)(void*,int,int);
58  i8 rssi;
59 } message_request_send_t;

61 #define MESSAGE_SEND_COORD (1<<7)
62 #define MESSAGE_SEND_ELE (1<<6)

78 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
79  u8 id ;
80  u8 resd;
81  u16 size ; //total number of bytes in packet stream
82  i32 lat ;
83  i32 lon ;
84  i32 ele ;
85  //start of message
86 } message_packet_t;
87 
89 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
90  u8 id ;
91  u8 resd;
92  u16 size ; //total number of bytes in packet stream
93  u16 resd_align6;
94  //start of message
95 } message_realtime_audio_packet_t;

98 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
99  union {
100  u8 which; //input
101  sn_t sn; //output
102  };
103 } message_request_contact_t;
104

108 } message_packet_send_contact_t;

124 } message_request_set_channel_t;
